message_1: Suppose you want to send a top secret message "MEET ME AT THE PARK" to your friend using the one-time pad encryption method. The pad you have is the numbers $12,~25,~06,~19,~08,~21,~10,~07,~14,~20,~19,~05,~09,~20,~08,~05,~18,~05,~04,~25,~17,~09,~07,~16,~20,~25,~01,~01,~13,~21,~06,~18,~15,~06,~04,~13,~19,~04,~04,~07,~19,~01,~23,~04,~22,~18,~23,~10,~09,~21,~07,~24,~11,~05,~13,~08,~07,~20,~06$. What is the ciphertext that you will send to your friend? (Note: The letters of the text have been converted into 2-digit numbers using the A=01, B=02,...,Z=26 convention)
